::DarkMouse::
She looked at Nigheyes. "You hate Predacons? Then what the heck are 
you doing in a Pred base then?" She walked along and led Hell Beast 
out of the base.

::KitKat::
"You know as well as I what kind of bot Megatron is.  He is powerful 
enough to help us get rid of the maximals.  If he behaves himself, he 
will continue to sit on the council.  If not, we eliminate him and 
rule with the rest of the predacon leaders."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Hell Beast raised his hands and followed Darkmouse as nighteyes 
drew her 
> gun on Hell Beast too. "Watch out, hes tricky. I hate the 
Predacons! Lets get 
> him out of here."
> 
>     Aracnia, in shock, "What? Why? Hes insane? Is this....logical?"
